Description of Data Value or Column Name: Legal entity that owns and operates pipeline
Name of pipeline system determined by corporate entity
Location along pipeline where throughputs are measured and reported, determined by Company
The latitude coordinate at the key point where throughputs are reported
The longitude coordinate at the key point where throughputs are reported
The amount of oil that shippers nominate (request) to ship on the pipeline
The amount of oil that is accepted to ship on the pipeline by the pipeline operator.
Percent by which each shipper's nominated volume is reduced if total nominations by all shippers are greater than the volume the pipeline can transport
